document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the subgenus Pseudocypus Mulsant & Rey (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and eight new species from China

Province: 3 males , 1 female , Altai Region , Xichahe ,
2050 m
,
31.VII.1960
, coll. Shuyong Wang (IZ-CAS)
; 4 males, Wuku Highway, north side of Tian Shan, 1600 m , 13.VI.1960 , coll. Shuyong Wang (IZ-CAS);
1 female , Altai Region , Azubai Region ,
2370 m
,
3.VII.1960
, coll. Shuyong Wang ( IZ- CAS )
;
2 males , 1 female , around Qinghe County ,
150–600 m
,
1.IX.1957
, coll. Guang Wang (IZ-CAS)
;
1 male , 1 female , Shaosu County , Alashan Region ,
2200 m
,
2.VIII.1978
, coll. Yanheng Han (IZ-CAS)
;
1 female , Shaosu County , Alashan Region ,
2200 m
,
6.VIII.1978
, coll. Yanheng Han (IZ-CAS)
;
4 males , Wusu County , Bayingou Pastures ,
5.VI.1999
, coll. Hongbin Liang (IZ-CAS).

Distribution.
Ocypus picipennis
is widely distributed from Europe to Asia, in China it is known only from Xinjiang Province.
